attributes.title: Glenfinnan Brewery
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

Using a 4 barrel brewery, commissioned in September 2006. Their first beer is a malty, reasonably bitter, brown ale which is being refined by experimenting with various quantities/types of aromatic hops in an effort to achieve a distinctive identity.
